name: Development Environment Updates To Project Site
description: Made updates to the golang application to allow for variable cdn values. In addition, I added a http.FileServer handler. The combination of both allows serverving local static files in a development enviornment.

name: CI/CD Auto Migrations
description: Updated the ansible role responsible for deploying our laravel application. In that role I added a task to execute the php-cli artisan command for database migration. I also created script to call migration task adhoc.

name: Project Site Updates
description:
Converting the existing ZendFramework 2 project (this) site into an AWS Lambda funcation by way of the Go programming language. And since I'm working on the site, I decided to convert the the look and feel of the project page into a blog format in place of the existing thumb format.

A better format, I think, for providing details and information that may come in handy later on.
